pageContext.claim: “He said, our business is a whole different business now because you got China [beef] approved; the other administrations couldn’t even come close. And I told him, you know how long it took? One sentence. I said, President Xi, we’d love to sell beef back in China again. He said, you can do that. That was the end of that.”
pageContext.analysis: China had already agreed to allow the sale of U.S. beef under a deal brokered by the Obama administration. The only thing new was that a definite date was set for when sales would begin.
